S04bsu031_u:1_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam / ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣusahasraiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvamahāsattvaiḥ /
S04bsu031_u:1_1: athāyuṣmān śāriputro yena maitreyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya caṃkramaḥ,
S04bsu031_u:1_2: tenopasamakramīt / upasaṃkramya anyonyaṃ saṃmodanīyāṃ kathāṃ bahuvidhāṃ vyatisārayitvā ubhau śilātale upāviśatām /
S04bsu031_u:2_0: athāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - adyātra śālistambamavalokya maitreya bhagavatā bhikṣubhyaḥ sūtramidamuktam - yo bhikṣavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati,
S04bsu031_u:2_1: sa dharmaṃ paśyati / yo dharmaṃ paśyati, sa buddhaṃ paśyati / ityuktvā bhagavāṃstūṣṇīṃ babhūvaṃ /
S04bsu031_u:2_2: atha maitreya sugatoktasūtrāntasya arthaḥ katamaḥ? pratītyasamutpādaḥ katamaḥ? dharma katamaḥ? buddhaḥ katamaḥ? kathaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyan dharmaṃ paśyati? kathaṃ dharmaṃ paśyan buddhaṃ paśyati?
S04bsu031_u:3_0: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - atra yaduktaṃ bhadanta śāriputra bhagavatā dharmasvāminā sarvajñena - yo bhikṣavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati,
S04bsu031_u:3_1: sa dharmaṃ paśyati / yo dharmaṃ paśyati, sa buddhaṃ paśyati iti, tatra katamaḥ pratītyasamutpādo nāma? pratītyasamutpādo nāma yadidam - asmin sati idaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu031_u:3_3: saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam / vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam / nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam /
S04bsu031_u:3_5: sparśapratyayā vedanā / vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā / tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānam / upādānapratyayo bhavaḥ / bhavapratyayā jāti / jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ saṃbhavanti /
S04bsu031_u:3_6: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
S04bsu031_u:3_17: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati /
S04bsu031_u:4_1: tadyathā - samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyaksaṃkalpaḥ samyagvāk samyakkarmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ samyaksmṛtiḥ samyaksamādhiḥ /
S04bsu031_u:4_2: ayamukto bhagavatā āryāṣṭāṅgiko mārgaḥ phalalābhanirvāṇaikasaṃgṛhīto dharmaḥ /
S04bsu031_u:5_0: tatra katamo buddho bhagavān? yaḥ sarvadharmāvabodhādbuddha ucyate,
S04bsu031_u:6_0: tatra kathaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati? ihoktaṃ bhagavatā - ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satatasamitam,
S04bsu031_u:6_2: (sa dharmaṃ paśyati) / yastu evaṃ dharmaṃ (ŚālSū, Vaidya 101) satatasamitamajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajātamabhūtamakṛtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanālambanaṃ śivamanāhāryamavyayamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati,
S04bsu031_u:7_0: pratītyasamutpāda iti kasmāducyate? sahetukaḥ sapratyayo nāhetuko nāpratyayaḥ,
S04bsu031_u:7_3: utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaiveṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā yāvadyaiṣā dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā pratītyasamutpādasamatā tathatā aviparītatathatā ananyatathatā bhūtatā satyatā aviparītatā aviparyayatā iti /
S04bsu031_u:8_0: atha ca punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate /
S04bsu031_u:8_3: tatra bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ katamāḥ? yadidaṃ bījādaṅkuraḥ /
S04bsu031_u:8_4: aṅkurātpatram / patrātkāṇḍam / kāṇḍānnālam / nālādgaṇḍaḥ / gaṇḍādgarbham / garbhācchūkaḥ / śūkātpuṣpam / puṣpāt phalam / asati bīje aṅkuro na bhavati,
S04bsu031_u:8_9: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bījenābhinirvartita iti /
S04bsu031_u:8_10: evaṃ yāvat puṣpasya naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ phalamabhinirvartayāmīti /
S04bsu031_u:8_12: atha punaḥ bīje sati aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
S04bsu031_u:8_13: evaṃ yāvat puṣpe sati phalasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
S04bsu031_u:9_0: kathaṃ bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ? ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnā samudāyāt /
S04bsu031_u:9_1: katameṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ samavāyāt? yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśaṛtudhātusamavāyādbāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
S04bsu031_u:9_11: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bījasya saṃdhāraṇakṛtyaṃ karomḥti /
S04bsu031_u:9_12: evamabdhātorapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bḥjaṃ snehayāmḥti /
S04bsu031_u:9_13: tejodhātorapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bḥjaṃ paripācayāmḥti /
S04bsu031_u:9_15: ākāśadhātorapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bḥjasyānāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomḥti /
S04bsu031_u:9_16: ṛtorapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bḥjasya pariṇāmanākṛtyaṃ karomḥti /
S04bsu031_u:9_17: bḥjasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bḥjaṃ (aṅkuraṃ?) abhinirvartayāmḥti /
S04bsu031_u:9_19: Vaidya 102) iti / atha punaḥ satsu eteṣu pratyayeṣu bḥje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttiebhavati /
S04bsu031_u:9_21: sa ca aṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvarakṛto na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto (na caikakāraṇādhḥno) nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ /
S04bsu031_u:9_22: atha punaḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśaṛtudhātusamavāyād bḥje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
S04bsu031_u:10_3: tatsadṛśānuprabandhataśca / kathaṃ na śāśvatata iti? yasmādanyo 'ṅkuraḥ anyadbījam /
S04bsu031_u:10_4: na ca ya evāṅkuraḥ tadeva bījam /
S04bsu031_u:10_6: bījaṃ punarnirudhyate, tadaivāṅkuraścotpadyate / tasmānna śāśvatataḥ / kathaṃ nocchedataḥ? na ca pūrvaniruddhād bījādaṅkuro niṣpadyate /
S04bsu031_u:10_7: nāpyaniruddhāt / api ca bījaṃ ca nirudhyate, tasminneva samaye aṅkura utpadyate tulādaṇḍonnāmāvanāmavat /
S04bsu031_u:10_8: ato nocchedataḥ // kathaṃ na saṃkrāntitaḥ? visadṛśo bījādaṅkura iti /
S04bsu031_u:10_9: ato na saṃkrāntitaḥ // kathaṃ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ? parīttaṃ bījamupyate,
S04bsu031_u:11_2: tatrādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ katamaḥ? yadidamavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ,
S04bsu031_u:11_6: jarāmaraṇaṃ na prajñāsyate / atha satyāmavidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇāmabhinirvṛttirbhavati /
S04bsu031_u:11_8: tatra avidyāyā naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ saṃskārānabhinirvartayāmīti /
S04bsu031_u:11_9: saṃskārāṇāmapi naivaṃ bhavati - vayamavidyayā abhinirvatitā iti /
S04bsu031_u:11_10: evaṃ yāvajjāterapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ jarāmaraṇamabhinirvartayāmīti /
S04bsu031_u:12_0: kathamādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ? ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt /
S04bsu031_u:12_1: katameṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt? yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyādādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
S04bsu031_u:12_2: tatra ādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pṛthivīdhātuḥ katamaḥ? yo 'yaṃ kāyasya saṃśleṣataḥ kaṭhinabhāvamabhinirvartayati,
S04bsu031_u:12_3: ayamucyate pṛthivīdhātuḥ / yaḥ kāyasya anuparigrahakṛtyaṃ karoti,
S04bsu031_u:12_10: ayamucyate vijñānadhātuḥ / tatra asatāmeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ kāyasyotpattirnaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu031_u:12_14: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ kāyasya saṃśleṣataḥ kaṭhinabhāvamabhinirvartayāmīti /
S04bsu031_u:12_15: abdhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ kāyasya anuparigrahakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S04bsu031_u:12_16: tejodhātorapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ kāyasya aśitapītabhakṣitaṃ paripācayāmīti /
S04bsu031_u:12_17: vāyudhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ kāyasya āśvāsapraśvāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S04bsu031_u:12_20: kāyasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanita iti /
S04bsu031_u:12_21: atha ca satsu eṣu pratyayeṣu kāyasyotpattirbhavati /
S04bsu031_u:13_0: tatra pṛthivīdhāturnātmā na sattvo na jīvo na jantuḥ na manajo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama na cānyasya kasyacit /
S04bsu031_u:13_1: evamabdhātustejodhāturvāyudhāturākāśadhāturvijñānadhātuḥ nātmā na sattvo na jīvo na jantuḥ na manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama na cānyasya kasyacit /
S04bsu031_u:14_0: tatra avidyā katamā? yā eṣāmeva ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāmekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā sukhasaṃjñā ātmasaṃjñā sattvajīvajantupoṣapuruṣapudgalasaṃjñā manujamānavasaṃjñā ahaṃkāramamakārasaṃjñā,
S04bsu031_u:14_1: evamādi vividhamajñānam / iyamucyate avidyeti / evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ viṣayeṣu rāgadveṣamohāḥ pravartante /
S04bsu031_u:14_6: rūpaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni tāni copādāya rūpam /
S04bsu031_u:14_10: sparśānubhavo vedanā / vedanādhyavasānaṃ tṛṣṇā / tṛṣṇāvaipulyamupādānam / upādānanirjātaṃ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma bhavaḥ /
S04bsu031_u:15_3: āyadvārārthena ṣaḍāyatanam / sparśanārthena sparśaḥ / anubhavanārthena vedanā / paritarṣaṇārthena tṛṣṇā / upādānarthena upādānam / punarbhavajananārthena bhavaḥ /
S04bsu031_u:15_5: skandhaparipākārthena jarā / vināśārthena (ŚālSū, Vaidya 104) maraṇam / śocanārthena śokaḥ / vacanaparidevanārthena paridevaḥ /
S04bsu031_u:16_1: evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante - puṇyopagā apuṇyopagā āneñjyopagāḥ /
S04bsu031_u:16_2: tatra puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu031_u:16_12: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati, tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /
S04bsu031_u:16_14: yastāṃ vedanāṃ viśeṣeṇāsvādayati abhinandati adhyavasyati adhyavasāya tiṣṭhati,
S04bsu031_u:16_18: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā ca,
S04bsu031_u:17_1: na nityo nānityo na saṃskṛto nāsaṃskṛto nāhetuko nāpratyayo na vedayitā na kṣayadharmo na vināśadharmo na nirodhadharmo 'nādikālapravṛtto 'nucchinno 'pravartate nadīsrotavat /
S04bsu031_u:18_1: na nityo nānityo na saṃskṛto nāsaṃskṛto nāhetuko nāpratyayo na vedayitā na kṣayadharmo na vināśadharmo na nirodhadharmo 'nādikālapravṛtto 'nucchinno 'nupravartate nadīsrotavat,
S04bsu031_u:18_2: atha ca imānyasya dvādaśāṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāri aṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante /
S04bsu031_u:18_3: katamāni catvāri? yaduta avidyā tṛṣṇā karma vijñānaṃ ca /
S04bsu031_u:18_12: tatra karmaṇo naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomīti /
S04bsu031_u:18_13: tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti /
S04bsu031_u:18_14: avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakirāmīti /
S04bsu031_u:18_16: atha ca vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhiṣyanditamavidyayā svavakīrṇaṃ virohati /
S04bsu031_u:18_18: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto (ŚālSū,
S04bsu031_u:18_19: Vaidya 105) neśvarakṛto na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ /
S04bsu031_u:18_20: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogadṛtusamavāyādanyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyāt tatra tatra āsvādaviddhaṃ vijñānabījamupapattyāyatanapratisaṃghau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati,
S04bsu031_u:18_21: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt /
S04bsu031_u:18_23: katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ? yaduta cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ ca ālokaṃ ca ākāśaṃ ca tajjamanasikāraṃ ca pratītya utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam /
S04bsu031_u:18_33: tatra cakṣuṣo naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāśrayakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S04bsu031_u:18_34: rūpasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya ālambanakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S04bsu031_u:18_35: ālokasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya avabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S04bsu031_u:18_36: ākāśasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya anāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S04bsu031_u:18_37: tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāhārakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S04bsu031_u:18_39: atha ca punaḥ satsu eṣu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyotpattirbhavati /
S04bsu031_u:19_2: hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt / tadyathā supariśuddhe ādarśamaṇḍale mukhapratibimbakaṃ dṛśyate /
S04bsu031_u:19_3: na ca tatra ādarśamaṇḍale mukhaṃ saṃkrāmati /
S04bsu031_u:19_4: asti ca mukhaprativijñaptiḥ, hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt / evamasmāllokāt na kaścit cyutaḥ,
S04bsu031_u:19_7: atha ca punaḥ parītte 'bhyudakabhājane candrasya pratibimbaṃ dṛśyate /
S04bsu031_u:20_1: upādānavaikalyānna jvalati, evameva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatra tatra upapattyāyatanapratisaṃghau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati,
S04bsu031_u:20_2: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt /
S04bsu031_u:21_4: kathaṃ na śāśvatataḥ? yasmādanye māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ,
S04bsu031_u:21_6: Vaidya 106) skandhāḥ, na tu ya evaṃ māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ,
S04bsu031_u:21_7: ta eva aupapattyaṃśikāḥ / api tu māraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante,
S04bsu031_u:21_8: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti /
S04bsu031_u:21_9: ato na śāśvatataḥ // kathaṃ nocchedataḥ? na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti,
S04bsu031_u:21_10: nāpyaniruddheṣu / api tu māraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante,
S04bsu031_u:21_11: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti tulādaṇḍonnāmāvanāmavat /
S04bsu031_u:21_12: ato nocchedataḥ // kathaṃ na saṃkrāntitaḥ? visadṛśāḥ sattvanikāyāḥ sabhāgāyāṃ jātyāṃ jātimabhinirvartayanti /
S04bsu031_u:21_13: ato na saṃkrāntitaḥ / kathaṃ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ? parīttaṃ karma kriyate,
S04bsu031_u:22_0: yaḥ kaścid bhadanta śāriputra imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ bhagavatā samyakpraṇītamevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitamajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajātamabhūtamakṛtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanālambaṃ śivamabhayamanāhāryamavyayamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati,
S04bsu031_u:22_1: asataḥ tucchataḥ riktataḥ asārataḥ rogataḥ gaṇḍataḥ śalyataḥ aghataḥ anityataḥ duḥkhataḥ śūnyataḥ anātmataḥ samanupaśyati,
S04bsu031_u:22_2: na sa pūrvāntaṃ pratisarati - kiṃ nvahamabhūvamatīte 'dhvani,
S04bsu031_u:22_4: aparāntaṃ vā na punaḥ pratisarati - kiṃ nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani,
S04bsu031_u:22_8: pratyutpannaṃ vā punarnaṃ pratisarati - kiṃ nvidam,
S04bsu031_u:22_9: kathaṃ nvidam, ke santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāmaḥ, ime sattvāḥ kuta āgatāḥ, itaścyutāḥ kutra gamiṣyantīti /
S04bsu031_u:22_10: yāni ekeṣāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ pṛthag loke dṛṣṭigatāni bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu031_u:22_11: tadyathā - ātmavādapratisaṃyuktāni sattvavādapratisaṃyuktāni jīvavādapratisaṃyuktāni pudgalavādapratisaṃyuktāni kautukamaṅgalavādapratisaṃyuktāni unmiñjitāni nimiñjitāni ca,
S04bsu031_u:22_12: tānyasya tasmin samaye prahīṇāni bhavanti parijñātāni samucchinnamūlāni tālamastakavadanābhāsagatāni āyatyāmanutpādānirodhadharmāṇi /
S04bsu031_u:23_0: yo bhadanta śāriputra evaṃvidhadharmakṣāntisamanvitaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ samyagavagacchati,
S04bsu031_u:23_1: tasya tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavit puruṣadamyasārathiranattaraḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākaroti - samyaksaṃbuddho buddho bhaviṣyasīti /
S04bsu031_u:24_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāṣitamabhinandya anupramodya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ /
